name: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
description: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) is an investment vehicle that allows investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin without the complexities of buying and storing the cryptocurrency directly. Founded in 2013 by Grayscale Investments, the trust enables institutional and accredited investors to invest in Bitcoin through shares that are traded on the OTCQX market. Grayscale Bitcoin Trust is the largest Bitcoin investment trust in the world, providing an easy and regulated way for investors to engage with Bitcoin, which has become a legitimate asset class. The trust holds Bitcoin on behalf of its shareholders, and each share represents a fractional ownership of the Bitcoin held by the trust. This structure aims to simplify the investment process while providing liquidity to investors through the public markets. Grayscale’s mission is to empower investors through exposure to digital assets, and it actively promotes the benefits and potential of cryptocurrency investments. The trust is fully regulated and audited, providing transparency and security to investors. As the cryptocurrency landscape continues to evolve, Grayscale Bitcoin Trust remains at the forefront, supporting the adoption of Bitcoin and educating the market on its potential as a long-term investment.
